CustomField.description: Possible building condition score. Values range from 1 to 5. 5 = Excellent, 4 = Good, 3 = Fair, 2 = Poor, 1 = Unsound
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Possible building condition score. Values range from 1 to 5. 5 = Excellent, 4 = Good, 3 = Fair, 2 = Poor, 1 = Unsound
CustomField.label: Building condition score
